segments.text: First , you need to have the list of books for your class . Do you have that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , when you have that , you can take it over to the bookstore . Can you find it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know where the bookstore is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just pass the gym and it's the first door on your left . Were you aware that you can also turn in your old textbooks for money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How can I do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take your used textbooks with you and give them to the representative near the entrance . He will pay you for them . Are you going today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I can't make it today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could help you with buying your books if you meet me there at 1
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll see you later then . Have a great day !
segments.speaker: S2
